basic.description: This course covers perturbation theory, scattering theory and the addition of angular momentum. Special topics may include: many-electron systems, path integral formulation of quantum mechanics, entanglement and quantum computing, quantum optics.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Advanced Quantum Physics

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ENPH 345 or PHYS 345 and registered in BSCE.
